description: When review patch https://review.openstack.org/#/c/30028/22 found, we can add non-existed instance to instance-group, but that shouldn't fix at that patch, should fix at instance group api.
title: Non-existed instance can be added to instance-group

comments.content: When review patch https://review.openstack.org/#/c/30028/22 found, we can add non-existed instance to instance-group, but that shouldn't fix at that patch, should fix at instance group api.
